column12: Polished-rod thermal imaging system for preventing failures in the operation of a sucker rod pump
column13: A device for detecting temperatures of a rod on a well having a housing; a clamp to secure the housing to a post of the well; a thermal radiation sensor secured to the front end of the housing; a visual radiation sensor secured to the front end of the housing, the visual radiation sensor is vertically aligned with the thermal radiation sensor; a microcontroller system placed inside housing, the microcontroller system includes a microcontroller, a non-volatile memory, and a serial interface in electronic communication; a position device placed inside the housing; a wireless device placed inside the housing; output device placed in the interior cavity of the housing; the microcontroller is in electronic communication with the serial interface for communicating with the visible radiation sensor, the thermal radiation sensor, the output module, the wireless module, and the position module.
column15: CHAVEZ RICO CESAR AUGUSTO;;LABRADO MENDIAS CARLOS ANDREE

column12: AN ELECTROCARDIOGRAPHY DEVICE FOR THE ECG MONITORING OF 12 LEADS INCLUDING BLUETOOTH FOR COMMUNICATION WITH MOBILES AND THE MONITORING AND COMMUNICATION PROCESS.
column13: The present invention refers to a electrocardiograph device for the ECG monitoring of 12 leads with Bluetooth for communication with mobiles and a monitoring and communication process, which is intended to provide a specialized diagnosis to family clinics, health units and hospitals, at a low cost with Bluetooth connectivity for transferring the information of the patients in a real time to the specialists and quickly treating the cardiovascular disease and therefore reducing the costs associated to a late treatment. The electrocardiograph device comprises: a) an impedance coupling and protection circuit, which is intended to protect the user from discharges resulting from the device; b) a driven-right-leg circuit intended to create a floating ground in the body of the patient, which is useful as a reference and will eliminate possible interferences of radiofrequency waves external to the patient such as those resulting from the electric wires; c) a circuit of the Wilson central termi nal for obtaining a central reference for acquiring the average of the potentials in the limbs; d) a selector switch for selecting the measurements of the 12-lead ECG in threes; e) an impedance coupling circuit and a passive high pass filter; f) a differentiator and amplifier circuit; g) a circuit for filtrating and conditioning the signal for the digital conversion; h) an analogue and digital converter and signal encryption; i) a Bluetooth communication module; and j) electrodes.
column14: MEJORA LABS S A DE C V
column15: CORRIGAN ROBIN WILLE;;BELTRAN MAURICIO DEVEAUX;;GONZALEZ EFRAIN DE JESUS CHAVEZ;;LARA CARLOS AUGUSTO MIRANDA;;CAMACHO ROBERTO ISAAC RICO;;FRANCO ALEJANDRO GARCÍA

column12: EQUIPO Y PROCESAMIENTO DE ENFRIAMIENTO Y NEUTRALIZACION DEL AGUA DE PURGAS DE CALDERAS
column13: La invencion equipo de enfriamiento y neutralizacion del agua de purga de calderas se refiere un equipo que permite metodos de enfriamiento y neutralizacion del agua alcalina de purga de calderas, respetuosos con el medio ambiente por su baja contaminacion, ocupa un espacio reducido y aprovecha el calor del agua alcalina de purgas. El equipo de enfriamiento y neutralizacion del agua de purga de calderas comprende un tanque de recepcion de agua (en su primera fase, recepciona agua de purga alcalina, y en una segunda fase, recepciona agua enfriada y neutralizada, es decir, hasta llegar a la temperatura y pH deseados, y, por ultimo, evacuar el agua directamente al sistema de desague), un tanque de CO2, y un tanque de enfriamiento y neutralizacion.

column12: TECHNOLOGICAL SYSTEM FOR ONLINE KNOWLEDGE MANAGEMENT.
column13: The invention relates to a technological system for online knowledge management integrated by a set of processes used for knowledge management, the system being characterized in that it comprises: a registration process; contribution creation; revision; and/or editing; publication; processing for interconnection; and optionally navigation. The novel system described in this invention provides a tool for use in the field of education and/or training, enabling strategies for knowledge management to be improved at the same time as providing a public having a particular interest with access to information by means of the abovementioned features.
column14: LIFE ONLINE S A DE C V
